data: I had fortunately sufficient influence upon my fair friends to persuade them to leave Calais early on the morning following; and two hours before Kilkee had opened his eyes upon this mortal life, we were far upon the road to Paris.
The Confessions of Harry Lorrequer â€” Volume 4
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
